description: Continued fraction expansion of the Reuleaux Triangle constant.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,20000
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac((Pi - sqrt(3))/2); for (n=1, 20000, write("b060709.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 09 2009]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 05 2001
